scripts.release: npm run zip && npm run clean && npm run upload
scripts.setup: npm install && brew tap tcnksm/ghr && brew install ghr
scripts.zip: npm run zip-darwin && npm run zip-win32
scripts.zip-win32: cd packages/v0.0.1 && zip -r cutecom-clone-win32-ia32.zip cutecom-clone-win32-ia32 && zip -r cutecom-clone-win32-x64.zip cutecom-clone-win32-x64
